item.title: CVE-2023-20856|2023-02-01T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- vmware%20vrealize%20operations%20%28vrops%29
item.description: VMware vRealize Operations (vROps) contains a CSRF bypass vulnerability. A malicious user could execute actions on the vROps platform on behalf of the authenticated victim user.
